context.title: Changelog for Rule: Audio elements have a transcript

context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"2eb176","name":"Audio elements have a transcript","rule_type":"atomic","description":"Non-streaming `audio` elements must have a text alternative for all included auditory information.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
